chunks.lyrics: "A Nightmare to Remember" by Dream Theater.
Music by John Myung, John Petrucci, Mike Portnoy, and Jordan Rudess.
Tuning: Standard C; from low to high C F A# D# G C
NOTE: The time signature varies quite a bit throughout the song so I will
specify the time signature as (4/4) before any measure that has a new time
signature. Also, my tempo markings are all approximations.
Update 7-3-09: So far I have all of the rhythm guitars tabbed out. I am
working on the guitar solos and bass next. Feel free to contribute your
tabs for the solos as that would be very helpful and greatly appreciated.
I'll give you credit if you do and I'll put everything together into a
~ = vibrato | | = legato (hold the note for it's value plus
h = hammer-on the value of the connected note)
s = slide to next note E = Eighth Note o|| ||o Repeat
/ = slide up (down is \) Q = Quarter Note o|| ||o Signs
x = right hand mute . = dotted (add half of the note value)
